roleset.name: temporary relief from
roleset.note: REPRIEVE-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from reprieve.01-n)

role.descr: agent, cause of relief or interruption

example.name: Be careful that you use arg 3 for the benefactive of the reprieve
example.text: Friday brought a 2 day reprieve for money managers

example.name: this is arg 1
example.text: His teacher's illness bought Johnn a reprieve from his looming math test.
